org.deri.tarql

Class CSVTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.algebra.table.TableBase
      • org.deri.tarql.CSVTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.algebra.Table

    public class CSVTable
extends com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.algebra.table.TableBase
implements com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.algebra.Table
    Implementation of ARQ's Table interface over a CSV file. Supports opening multiple iterators over the input, which will lead to multiple passes over the input CSV file. Connects to the input as lazily as possible, while still supporting the entire Table interface including size().

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of rows in the table. Is fast if an iterator over the table has already been exhausted. Otherwise, it will make a complete parsing pass over the input.
        Specified by:
        size in interface com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.algebra.Table
        Specified by:
